snippet.title: Conversations with Legends - ChiliKiwi
snippet.description:
A Nifty Island OG and a true pioneer in the metaverse. @JoeEvil and @oliver talked to @chilikiwiNFT about his experience in Nifty Island, speedrunning parkour courses and the potential for creativity within the game.

Nifty Island wants to highlight pioneers within the community. These people are known as legends. Here is a conversation with one.

ChiliKiwi's Twitter: https://twitter.com/chilikiwiNFT

Nifty Island Links
Website: https://www.niftyisland.com/
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nifty_island
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Nifty_Island 
Discord: http://discord.gg/NiftyIsland
